content.title: Upcoming Webinars
description: ​Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven

Learn about effective marketing strategies for small law firms, combining digital and traditional approaches. Join David Wolf, Partner at Wood, Atter & Wolf, P.A., on April 21 at 11 a.m. PT as he provides practical guidance on how to promote your firm and create an impactful brand that brings in business.

content.title: Recent Recordings
description: ​Using ChatGPT & AI Tools for Writing Law Firm Marketing Content: The Good, The Bad, The Ugly

Want to learn more about how ChatGPT and other AI models can help your law firm create marketing content? Stream this on-demand presentation, as members of the Justia team explore how ChatGPT produces content, why lawyers should be mindful of factual inaccuracies in AI content, and more!
Fast-Mover Advantage: Law Marketing Ethics Issues in a Race for Clients

Law firms struggle to compete in a world where attorney ethical standards and enforcement vary from state to state, and the legal marketplace is increasingly fast-paced. In this on-demand webinar, Attorney Micah Buchdahl leads a webinar discussing legal marketing and ethics in this landscape.
